We recognize the importance of maintaining the confidentiality, integrity and security of your personal information (" Personal Data ") and have written this privacy policy (" Policy ") to explain how your Personal Data is collected, stored, used and disclosed by Ascendio TechVision S.R.L., a company incorporated under the Romanian law, having its headquarters at 202K Splaiul Independentei, Bldg. B3, Entr. B, 4th floor, suite 26, District 6, Bucharest, Romania, sole identification number 38091006, registered with the Trade Registry under no. J40/14259/2017 (" Ascendio ", " Us "), as a data controller, with respect to (i) your access to and use of our application (,, App "), (ii) the access to, and use of our therapist platform available at the URL https://specialist.im-fine.app (,, Platform "), (iii) the access to, and use of our web database of healthcare professionals (as defined below) available at the URL https://im-fine.app/ro/psihologi-psihoterapeuti (" Web Database "), (iv) the access to, and use of our clinic platform available at the URL http://clinic.im-fine.app/ (" Clinic Platform "), (v) and the access to, and use of the content of the App, the Platform and the Web Database including of the services provided by Ascendio (collectively, " Services ").
